title: Update odds input to fractional format with /1 denominator and 0 placeholder

requirements.text: Update the odds numerator input field in the New Entry flow (EntryFlow.tsx) so the placeholder text displays '0' when the field is empty, replacing any existing placeholder text.

quotes: I need the odds to be fractional, 0 when unfilled

acceptanceCriteria: The odds numerator input field shows '0' as placeholder text when empty
No other placeholder text (e.g., 'e.g., 5.0' or '-/1') is displayed in the input field
The placeholder disappears when the user begins typing

requirements.text: Position a non-editable '/1' label immediately to the right of each odds numerator input field in the New Entry flow to visually represent the fractional format with a fixed denominator of 1.
acceptanceCriteria: A non-editable '/1' label is rendered immediately adjacent to the right side of each odds numerator input field
The '/1' label is consistently positioned across all 6 contender rows
The label uses the same visual styling (font size, color, alignment) as the existing odds display pattern to maintain consistency

constraints: Do not modify the existing odds storage model (numerator/denominator structure)
Do not change the validation logic for odds inputs
Maintain mobile-first responsive design and touch-friendly input sizing
nonGoals: Changing how odds are stored in the data model
Modifying odds display format in History or Stats views
Updating odds parsing or conversion logic
